Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities

Activities of the application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity_Information_Detailed
    Details about the application and the authors
    Activity_Register
    Activity for registering a new user.
    Activity_Setup
    This is the activity where application settings can be modified.
    Activity_Splash_Login
    If the user is not logged in, then this activity appears.
    Activity_Thinking
    This is a splash activity with no interaction elements that it is shown while trying to connect with the server for user authentication.
    FActivity_TabHost
    Tabs are hosted in this FragmentActivity.
    Fragment_Comments
    Fragment to show comments
    Fragment_Filters
    This fragment contains the filtering options for the issues.
    Fragment_Issue_Details
    Show issue details.
    Fragment_List
    Show a list containing all issues (Filtered)
    Fragment_Map
    Main Fragment that contains a map showing all issues
    Fragment_NewIssueA
    A form for writing issue title, description, category, attaching photo, and proceed to localization of the issue (Fragment_NewIssueB)
    Fragment_NewIssueB
    Second fragment for submitting an issue: selecting the location of the issue and submit to remote server

Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities Description

Activities of the application. They are "windows" where information is visualized.
